fields.normal: Normal Attack Perform up to 4 consecutive strikes.
fields.charged: Charged Attack Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents. At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.
fields.plunging: Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

description.0: Summons protective stone armor, dealing <geo>Geo DMG</geo> to surrounding opponents and creating a shield. The shield's DMG Absorption scales based on Noelle's DEF.
description.1: The shield has the following properties:
2: When Noelle's Normal and Charged Attacks hit a target, they have a certain chance to regenerate HP for all characters.
Possesses 150% DMG Absorption efficiency against all Elemental and Physical DMG.
description.4: The amount of HP healed when regeneration is triggered scales based on Noelle's DEF.
description.6: Noelle is both a dutiful maid and a valiant knight.

description.0: Gathering the strength of stone around her weapon, Noelle strikes the opponents surrounding her within a large AoE, dealing <geo>Geo DMG</geo>.
description.1: Afterwards, Noelle gains the following effects:
2: Converts attack DMG to <geo>Geo DMG</geo> that cannot be overridden by any other elemental infusion.
Increased ATK that scales based on her DEF.
description.4: Sometimes, it's not just dust that needs sweeping...

description.0: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a DEF-boosting dish, Noelle has a 12% chance to obtain double the product.
When Noelle is in the party but not on the field, this ability triggers automatically when your active character's HP falls below 30%:
description.1: Creates a shield for your active character that lasts for 20s and absorbs DMG equal to 400% of Noelle's DEF.
description.2: The shield has a 150% DMG Absorption effectiveness against all Elemental and Physical DMG.
description.3: This effect can only occur once every 60s.

description.0: Every 4 Normal or Charged Attack hits will decrease the CD of Breastplate by 1s.
description.1: Hitting multiple opponents with a single attack is only counted as 1 hit.

description.0: While Sweeping Time and Breastplate are both in effect, the chance of Breastplate's healing effects activating is increased to 100%.
Decreases the Stamina Consumption of Noelle's Charged Attacks by 20% and increases her Charged Attack DMG by 15%.
When Breastplate's duration expires or it is destroyed by DMG, it will deal 400% ATK of Geo DMG to surrounding opponents.
Increases the Level of Sweeping Time by 3.
Sweeping Time increases Noelle's ATK by an additional 50% of her DEF.
description.1: Additionally, every opponent defeated during the skill's duration adds 1s to the duration, up to 10s.
